state: You are now playing a profound session of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First of all, make an effort to travel south. With that done, take a trip east. Once you finish that, make an attempt to go to the east. Okay, and then, travel east. Then, go south. Then, make an attempt to go to the east. With that accomplished, go to the east. Once you succeed at that, go to the north. Then, attempt to head west. After that, move north. Then, attempt to travel west. With that over with, make an attempt to venture north. That done, head north. With that accomplished, take a trip east. With that over with, recover the coin from the floor of the cellar. And once you've done that, you win! -= Cubicle =- You've just walked into a cubicle. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Cubicle =-0/1

-= Vault =- You're now in the vault. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. > -= Vault =-0/2

-= Sauna =- Well I'll be, you are in the place we're calling the sauna. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Sauna =-0/3
-= Steam Room =- You are in a steam room. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. > -= Steam Room =-0/4

-= Basement =- You arrive in a basement. A standard one. You can barely contain your excitement. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west. > -= Basement =-0/5

-= Playroom =- You are in a playroom. A standard kind of place. The room is well lit. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. > -= Playroom =-0/6

-= Workshop =- You find yourself in a workshop. An ordinary kind of place. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not? You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. > -= Workshop =-0/7

-= Shower =- I am sorry to announce that you are now in the shower. You begin to take stock of what's in the room. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Shower =-0/8
-= Bar =- You are in a bar. A normal kind of place. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Bar =-0/9
-= Studio =- You find yourself in a studio. A standard one. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Studio =-0/10
-= Cookery =- Well, here we are in the cookery. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. > -= Cookery =-0/11
-= Bedroom =- You arrive in a bedroom. A standard one. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. > -= Bedroom =-0/12
-= Study =- You find yourself in a study. A typical one. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unblocked exit to the south. > -= Study =-0/13

-= Dish-Pit =- You are in a dish-pit. A normal kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. > -= Dish-Pit =-0/14
-= Cellar =- You're now in a cellar. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. There is a coin on the floor. > -= Cellar =-0/15
